headline: ‘SHE SHOULD BE BANISHED FROM POLITE SOCIETY’
author: IWB
sentences:
“Her husband has been #metooed and has been fingered to be on Epstein’s island and you know the Foundation, that’s just like a washed up money laundering operation.”
Watters offered up a little speculation based on Durham’s recent filings… KEEP READING»>
Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio said that Donald Trump was ‘right on target’ when he suggested Hillary Clinton’s operatives should be executed after she was accused of treason by the former president.

Recent filings by special counsel John Durham reveal the lengths to which Hillary and Co. went to investigate Trump’s “ties” to Russia, including hiring a tech company to infiltrate Trump Tower servers and monitor his White House activity.
Trump launched a blistering attack on Clinton on Saturday after special counsel John Durham said his team had spied on his White House servers to find ties to Russia so as to smear him.
Jesse Watters spoke with his co-hosts of The Five about the bombshell report —and he absolutely torched Clinton.“I think Hillary should be banished from polite society.
I’m not comparing her to O.J., because, you know, we have no proof that she ever murdered anybody, but I would like to see Hillary treated the way O.J.
He’s not really welcome places, he’s kind of a pariah,” Watters replied.
“Right now she is a certified political criminal,” Watters continued.
The walls are closing in on Hillary Clinton.
